text:
e="preserve">Samsuddin Ahmed (1945 – 20 December 2020) was a Bangladesh Awami League politician. He was a member of the Jatiya Sangsad from 2001 to 2006. He was a member of the Bangladesh Awami League. Ahmed was born in Manikganj, Bengal Presidency.
Ahmed died at a Dhaka hospital on 20 December 2020 from COVID-19 at the age of 75.
